title: Phishing Email
description:
An employee reports a supicious email to InfoSec@Example.com.

Observe the following

* Reported Email contained original email as MSG attachment
* Reported Informationm (sender, email message) is presented as a handy reference
* Suspicious email information (sender, reciever, subject, body, header, sender domain etc) is presented for analysing the case
* Investigate Suspicous Playbook is available to demonstrate various investigation activities such as
    * Spoofing (by checking sender and return path)
    * Blacklisted Keyword match (bitcoin in this case)

alertFields.name: Suspicious Email: Urgent: Requesting CEO Level Demo Environment
alertFields.emailBody: Hey Team, We stand to win some Bitcoins if we can demonstrate our software on http://demo.gumblar.cn/ Cheers, Raj

alertFields.emailSubject: Urgent: Requesting CEO Level Demo Environment
alertFields.reporterEmailBody:
CyberSec team – please can you investigate the attached suspicious email we have received.

We don’t have anybody name Shiv or Raj in the organization, and moreover, the return address seems to be the spoofed domain.
